TITLE: Episode 49 - Black Flags and the Black Experience [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: Thaddeus from Thank You For Your Servers and Kim from Lesbertarian come on to discuss George Floyd, the protests, the riots, race relations, Cheeto Jesus, and the black experience.
CONTENT: Thaddeus from Thank You For Your Servers and Kim from Lesbertarian come on to discuss George Floyd, the protests, the riots, race relations, Cheeto Jesus, and the black experience.
